materials.raw_text:
Bismuth Oxide (Bi2O3) - 24.5 g 
 Copper(II) Oxide (CuO) - 16.5 g 
 Lead(II) Oxide (PbO) - 19.5 g 
 Distilled Water - 50 mL (for mixing)

sourcing.instructions:
Bismuth Oxide - Chemical supply stores or online suppliers (e.g., Sigma-Aldrich). 
 Copper(II) Oxide - Chemical supply stores or online suppliers. 
 Lead(II) Oxide - Chemical supply stores or online suppliers. 
 Distilled Water - Supermarkets or pharmacies.
steps: Bismuth Oxide - Chemical supply stores or online suppliers (e.g., Sigma-Aldrich).

1. Measure out 24.5 g of Bismuth Oxide and place it in a clean mixing container.
2. Add 16.5 g of Copper(II) Oxide to the same container.
3. Add 19.5 g of Lead(II) Oxide to the mix.
4. Gradually add 50 mL of distilled water to the container while stirring continuously to form a homogeneous slurry.
preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 24.5 g of Bismuth Oxide and place it in a clean mixing container. 
 2. Add 16.5 g of Copper(II) Oxide to the same container. 
 3. Add 19.5 g of Lead(II) Oxide to the mix. 
 4. Gradually add 50 mL of distilled water to the container while stirring continuously to form a homogeneous slurry.
